Detailed Description

template<int numJoints> template class MotionRequest

Internal class that implements a motion request.

The motion queue of the DefaultTrajectoryGenerator consists of elements of type MotionRequest.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Constructor.

~MotionRequest ( )
 

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

void init ( )
 

Initializes all variables of the motion request.

Member Data Documentation

int d_type
 

Type of the motion request (See enum above).

MotionId d_motionId
 

The Id of this motion request.

bool d_cartesianMode
 

If true, for all following moves Cartesian interpolation is used, otherwise joint interpolation.

Vector< numJoints > d_jointPosition
 

The position of the motion request, usually a via or target point along the trajectory.

double d_motionTime
 

Motion time from this to next position.

double d_blendingTime
 

Time before reaching the target position when blending starts.

bool d_useVelocityLimit
 

If this is set to true, then the motion time d_motionTime is calculated from d_jointVelocityLimit.

Vector< numJoints > d_jointAcceleration
 

The acceleration for all joints.

Vector< numJoints > d_jointVelocityLimit
 

Maximum velocity for all joints.

double d_speedScale
 

A value that d_velocityLimits is being multiplied before use.

Server::ClientId d_blockedClientId
 

If the move was blocking, this is the id of the client that is still waiting for a reply. Once the motion is complete the trajectory generator will reply to this client.

bool d_firstRequest
 

Is true if this is the first request queued after the queue was empty.
